section.heading: Courier company responsibility.
section.text: No courier company shall employ, compensate, utilize, or contract with a commercial bicycle operator who does not have a valid commercial bicycle operator’s permit and a properly registered bicycle.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 25-301: § 4 of D.C. Law 25-301 provided that the repeal of this section by § 3(c) of D.C. Law 25-301 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
